GET /api/.description: serves this JSON object, a list of endpoints and HTTP methods used to interact with them

GET /api/posts/.description: serves an array of blog_post entries

GET /api/posts/<int:blog_post_id>/.description: serves the blog_post entry with the given blog_post_id
possible errors: 404: blog_post with the given blog_post_id does not exist

GET /api/users/<int:user_id>/posts.description: serves an array of blog_post entries owned by the user with the given user_id
possible errors: 404: user with the given user_id does not exist

POST /api/posts/.description: takes a blog_post JSON object and serves the created blog_post entry
possible errors: 404: user with the given user_id does not exist
400: 'user_id' is not an integer or 'body' is not a string
400: 'user_id' or 'body' do not exist on the sent JSON object

PATCH /api/posts/<int:blog_post_id>/vote.description: takes a votes JSON object, adds it to the votes of the given blog_post entry and serves the updated blog_post entry
possible errors: 404: blog_post with the given blog_post_id does not exist
400: 'vote_increment' does not exist on the sent JSON object

PATCH /api/posts/<int:blog_post_id>/.description: takes a blog_post JSON object, replaces the body with the given body and serves the updated blog_post entry

example request.body: Something something Game of Thrones good

blog_post.body: Something something Game of Thrones good

possible errors: 404: blog_post with the given blog_post_id does not exist
400: 'body' does not exist on the sent JSON object
